PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MaterialConcrete
PropertySetDef.Definition: A set of extended mechanical properties related to concrete materials.

PropertyDef.Name: CompressiveStrength
PropertyDef.Definition: The compressive strength of the object or material.

PropertyDef.Name: MaxAggregateSize
PropertyDef.Definition: The maximum aggregate size of the concrete.

PropertyDef.Name: AdmixturesDescription
PropertyDef.Definition: Description of the admixtures added to the concrete mix.

PropertyDef.Name: Workability
PropertyDef.Definition: Description of the workability of the fresh concrete defined according to local standards.

PropertyDef.Name: WaterImpermeability
PropertyDef.Definition: Description of the water impermeability denoting the water repelling properties.

PropertyDef.Name: ProtectivePoreRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: The protective pore ratio indicating the frost-resistance of the concrete.
